programme.title: Joyful Noise
programme.desc: Two strong-willed singers (Queen Latifah, Dolly Parton) must learn to work in harmony if their Georgia church choir is to stay together and win a national competition.

programme.title: Prison Song
programme.desc: A young New Yorker (Q-Tip) goes to prison after his foster brother (Fat Joe) dies during their fight in a subway station.

programme.title: Preacher's Kid
programme.desc: A smooth-talking singer convinces a young woman (LeToya Luckett) to leave the security of her family, friends and church to join a traveling gospel show.

programme.title: Lady Cocoa
programme.desc: Thugs try to kill a woman (Lola Falana) released from prison before she can testify against her boyfriend.

programme.title: The Queen Boxer
programme.desc: An avenger (Judy Lei) of murder destroys a crime ring with her kung fu.

programme.title: Abar: Black Superman
programme.desc: Upon moving into a bigoted neighborhood, the scientist father of a persecuted Black family gives a superpower elixir to his tough bodyguard, who thus becomes a superpowered crimefighter.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Host Sinbad; music guests Maxi Priest, Eric B. and Rakim; comic J'vonne Pearson.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Tracie Spencer, The Whispers, comedians Steve Luray and The Professor.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Musical guests: Sybil, L.L. Cool J. Comics: Lenny Varnedoe, Kim Coles.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Guests Jeffrey Osborne and Monie Love; comedy by Jack Simmons and Sherri Mosley.

programme.title: Winners and Sinners
programme.desc: Five criminals who have just been released from prison vow to never commit a crime again. However, after opening a cleaning company, they get entangled in a gang war.

programme.title: The Pastor's Secrets
programme.desc: A new pastor must put a scandal-ridden church back on track, but old enemies resurface to threaten his mission.

programme.title: The Pastor's Daughters
programme.desc: A pastor's daughters must settle their differences as he begins to die.

programme.title: Creepin' With the Deacon
programme.desc: A young minister falls in love with a gorgeous young woman, who happens to be the pastor's wife; this hilarious faith-based comedy shows exactly what happens when two wrongs try to make a right; what happens in the dark always comes to light.

programme.title: Blackstar Warrior
programme.desc: In a 1970s version of the future, a space detective searching for the truth about his real mother uncovers his adoptive parents' secret genetics lab and discovers it's controlled by a space nun cult bent on taking over the galaxy.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Summer is suing her neighbor, David, for the cost and expenses of her pet rabbit, Ziggy, that was killed by his dog, Butch; David says it's not his dog's fault and she should put a better quality fence up to keep other animals out.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Lisa decided to share her Netflix account with Brandon only to find out that he had given access to others as well; she wants Brandon to pay, but he refuses, claiming that she's just mad because she wants to be more than friends with him.

programme.title: Judge Mom
programme.desc: Heather claims Richard owes her 3 months rent because he cheated on her.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.desc: Amir Devaughn is shot twice while driving; two juvenile suspects shoots Ronald Miller.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.desc: Dharmaniya Moore suffers; Starsky Garcia is murdered; Bradley Timpf is killed during a carjacking.

programme.title: Lean on Me
programme.desc: Principal Joe Clark (Morgan Freeman) goes to bat against drugs, crime and bad grades in his Paterson, N.J., high school.
